name: Alex Chen
professional_summary: Experienced Full-Stack Software Engineer with 6+ years of proven expertise in designing, developing, and deploying scalable distributed systems and machine learning applications. Strong track record of delivering high-impact solutions in fast-paced startup and enterprise environments. Passionate about clean code, best practices, and mentoring junior engineers.

work_experience.description: Lead engineer on core platform team
achievements: Led team of 8 engineers developing microservices platform serving 10M+ users
Architected and deployed Kubernetes infrastructure reducing deployment time by 70%
Implemented ML pipeline processing 1B+ events daily with 99.9% uptime
Reduced API latency by 60% through query optimization and caching strategies
Mentored 5 junior engineers on software design and best practices

work_experience.description: Full-stack engineer working on web applications
achievements: Built React-based frontend serving 1M+ monthly active users
Developed backend APIs using Node.js and Python handling 10K requests/sec
Implemented real-time features using WebSockets and Redis
Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization
Led migration from monolith to microservices architecture
Developed full-stack web applications from scratch
Built automated testing framework improving code quality
Deployed applications to AWS and managed infrastructure
Participated in agile development process with 2-week sprints

education.details: Focused on machine learning and distributed systems

projects.name: Distributed Job Application Agent

achievements: Designed and implemented ML pipeline for job relevance scoring
Achieved 98% test coverage with comprehensive test suite
Deployed to production serving 10K+ users
Implemented real-time monitoring and alerting

projects.name: Microservices Architecture Migration
